title: Request LWD Services
description: A geologist decides to run a Logging-While-Drilling (LWD) tool to get real-time formation data in the next section of a well.

tasks.description: Review the drilling plan to identify the target interval for LWD.
tasks.expected_outcome: The geologist confirms the depth interval for the logging run.

tasks.description: Select the appropriate LWD tool suite (e.g., Gamma Ray, Resistivity, Neutron-Density) for the geological objectives.
tasks.expected_outcome: A suitable combination of LWD tools is selected.

tasks.description: Send a formal request to the drilling contractor and LWD service company to add the tool to the next bottom hole assembly (BHA).
tasks.expected_outcome: A service request is sent and acknowledged by the relevant parties.
